long_description: The Oboz Jasper shoes are constructed with supple-yet-durable suede uppers that breathe well and cradle your feet for all-day comfort. Nylon mesh linings wick moisture, dry quickly and further enhance breathability. EVA midsoles cushion the ride; deluxe footbeds keep their shape over time for good support. Oboz Jasper shoes feature high-friction, nonmarking rubber outsoles that grip with ease in all directions. Closeout.
short_description: The Oboz Jasper shoes are constructed with supple-yet-durable suede uppers that breathe well and cradle your feet for all-day comfort.
